summary: An ordinance relating to, and providing for the acquisition of, certain motor busses and certain motor bus chasses from Garford Motor Truck Company, Inc., The White Company, and the lamping-McDonald Motor Company, Inc., and payment therefor out of the funds provided for in, and designating the same as addition, betterments and extensions contemplated by, Ordinance no. 50344; authorizing the sale of $75,000.00 of Railway Extension Utility Warrants authorized by said ordinance in order to effectuate said acquisition and payment; prescribing the interest rate on said warrants; and the maturity dates, denominations and series designation thereof; and repealing all ordinances and parts of ordinances in conflict herewith.
